content: drops design pattern no bm-003-bn yarn group a ----------------------------------------------------------- size 3/5 - 6/9 - 10/12 years materials drops baby merino from garnstudio for all sizes use 50 g color no 14 purple 50 g color no 26 light old pink 50 g color no 27 old pink and use drops glitter from garnstudio 1 spool no 02 silver drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm / us 1 5 - or size needed to get 26 sts x 34 row in stockinette st = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 drops crochet hook size 3 mm / c - for flower
